text: 39|47|bhumiyilullat muluvanum ateateappam atrayum kutiyum akramam pravartticcavarute adhinattil untayirunnal pealum uyirttelunnelpinre nalile katutta siksayil ninn raksappetan atavar prayascittamayi nalkiyekkum. avar kanakk kuttiyittillayirunna palatum allahuvinkal ninn avarkk velippetukayum ceyyum
